crazyballrun.game.physics

Enum CollisionTexture.GroundProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CollisionTexture.GroundProperty>
      • crazyballrun.game.physics.CollisionTexture.GroundProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CollisionTexture.GroundProperty>
    Enclosing class:
    CollisionTexture

    public static enum CollisionTexture.GroundProperty
extends java.lang.Enum<CollisionTexture.GroundProperty>
    Defines the result of collisions between rigid bodies and a particular color of the collision texture image. In other words: it's the kind of ground the texture color represents.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DEFAULT
      default friction and coriolis values
      HIGH_FRICTION
      slows down the rigid body by increasing the friction
      ICE_GROUND
      zero-friction and high coriolis force
      LOW_FRICTION
      friction is set to "0" while the rigid body is here
      NEXT_LAYER
      changes to the next layer if the former color has been "PREVIOUS_LAYER"
      PREVIOUS_LAYER
      changes to the previous layer if the former color has been "NEXT_LAYER"
      WALL
      collision with rigid bodies
      WATER_GROUND
      very high friction and no coriolis force, in addition the rigid body is painted half transparent
